subScenes.name: 开场寒暄
subScenes.description: 经理与员工互相问候，营造轻松氛围

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey Alex, thanks for coming in — how’s it going?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，亚历克斯，谢谢你能来，最近怎么样？

responses.text: Pretty good, thanks! Just glad to be here.
responses.text_cn: 还不错，谢谢！很高兴能来。

responses.text: I'm doing well, thank you. Looking forward to our chat.
responses.text_cn: 我很好，谢谢，很期待这次谈话。

responses.text: Not bad!
responses.text_cn: 还行！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气开场，拉近距离

qaPairs.speakerText: I know this time of year’s busy — appreciate you making room for this.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我知道这会儿大家都忙，谢谢你抽出时间。

responses.text: Of course! This is important to me.
responses.text_cn: 当然！这对我来说很重要。

responses.text: No problem at all — I actually wanted to talk to you too.
responses.text_cn: 没问题，我其实也想跟你聊聊。

responses.text: Sure thing!
responses.text_cn: 没问题！

subScenes.name: 回顾成就
subScenes.description: 员工主动汇报过去一年的关键成果

qaPairs.speakerText: You really knocked it out of the park with the Q3 client rollout — congrats!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你第三季度的客户上线做得太棒了，恭喜！

responses.text: Thanks! I’m proud we hit the deadline ahead of schedule.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！我很自豪我们提前完成了。

responses.text: It was a team effort — the devs and PMs really helped out.
responses.text_cn: 这是团队的功劳，开发和产品帮了大忙。

responses.text: Glad it went well!
responses.text_cn: 还好顺利！

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应时突出团队或具体成果

qaPairs.speakerText: What’s one thing you’re most proud of this year?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 今年你最自豪的一件事是什么？

responses.text: I led the internal training program — over 50 staff got certified.
responses.text_cn: 我主导了内部培训，50多名员工通过认证。

responses.text: Probably reducing our support ticket volume by 30% — that was a big win.
responses.text_cn: 可能是把支持工单降了30%，那真是个大突破。

responses.text: Hard to pick one, but I improved a lot.
responses.text_cn: 难选一个，但我进步很大。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用数据支撑成就，更显专业

subScenes.name: 接受反馈
subScenes.description: 经理提出改进建议，员工积极回应

qaPairs.speakerText: I noticed you’ve been avoiding team feedback sessions — any reason?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我注意到你最近避开了团队反馈会，有原因吗？

responses.text: You're right — I’ve been nervous about it. I’d like to get better at receiving feedback.
responses.text_cn: 你说得对，我有点紧张，我想学会更好地接受反馈。

responses.text: I didn’t realize it was an issue. I’ll make sure to join next time.
responses.text_cn: 我没意识到这是个问题，下次一定参加。

responses.text: Yeah, I’ve been swamped.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，我最近太忙了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 承认问题并表达改进意愿

qaPairs.speakerText: I think you could step up more in cross-department meetings — your insights are valuable.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我觉得你在跨部门会议中可以更主动些，你的见解很有价值。

responses.text: That makes sense — I’ll prepare talking points ahead of next meeting.
responses.text_cn: 有道理，我会提前准备好发言要点。

responses.text: I’ll try speaking up more — thanks for the nudge!
responses.text_cn: 我会多发言的，谢谢提醒！

responses.text: Okay, I’ll work on it.
responses.text_cn: 好的，我会改进。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体行动回应建设性批评

subScenes.name: 设定目标
subScenes.description: 共同协商下一年职业发展与资源支持

qaPairs.speakerText: What’s one goal you’d like to focus on next year?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 明年你最想专注的目标是什么？

responses.text: I’d like to lead a small project — maybe in product design?
responses.text_cn: 我想主导一个小项目，比如产品设计方向？

responses.text: I’m aiming for the Advanced Analytics certification — could use your support.
responses.text_cn: 我想考高级数据分析认证，需要你的支持。

responses.text: To be better at time management.
responses.text_cn: 提高时间管理能力。

qaPairs.usageNote: 目标要具体，最好带方向或认证

qaPairs.speakerText: We can allocate budget for that cert — would you want mentorship too?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们可以为这个认证批预算，要不要安排导师？

responses.text: Yes, absolutely! A mentor in data analytics would be huge.
responses.text_cn: 当然要！有数据分析导师太有帮助了。

responses.text: Budget’s great, but I’ll hold off on mentorship for now.
responses.text_cn: 预算很好，导师我先不急。

responses.text: That’d be awesome — thanks!
responses.text_cn: 太好了，谢谢！

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确表达需求，不回避资源请求

subScenes.name: 结束道别
subScenes.description: 总结共识，礼貌结束面谈

qaPairs.speakerText: So to recap — you’ll join feedback sessions, aim for the cert, and I’ll set up mentorship. Sound good?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 总结一下：你参加反馈会、考认证，我安排导师，这样可以吗？

responses.text: Perfect — thanks for the clarity and support!
responses.text_cn: 太好了，谢谢你的明确和帮助！

responses.text: Yeah, that works for me. I’ll send a follow-up email.
responses.text_cn: 没问题，我会发封跟进邮件。

responses.text: Sounds good.
responses.text_cn: 可以。

qaPairs.usageNote: 复述共识，体现认真态度

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks again for your hard work this year — looking forward to next one!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 感谢你今年的付出，期待明年一起继续！

responses.text: Thank you for the opportunity — I’m excited to grow here!
responses.text_cn: 谢谢给我机会，我很期待在这里成长！

responses.text: Appreciate it! See you around.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！回头见。

responses.text: I’ll keep pushing!
responses.text_cn: 我会继续努力的！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用积极语气收尾，留下好印象
